scripts.db:up: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml up || docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml up
scripts.db:up-detached: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml up -d || docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml up -d
scripts.db:down: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml down || docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml down
